author: bez625
content: <@199561711278227457> if you could point me in the direction of how to setup a validator on devnet-5 I'd appreciate it. I've tested on mekong, but I see beacon client versions have advanced on devnet-5 so i dont really want to report problems to clients that may have been fixed already.

author: parithosh
content: Hmm, i would wait a 1-2 more days or use kurtosis for a local devnet and then just make deposits/etc on there. I'll try to make sure the devnet is fine by tomorrow.

author: bez625
content: Awesome! I'll take a look at kurtosis in the meantime. Thanks for the help
